network

Interface ServerInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Server

    public interface ServerInterface
extends Remote
    Interfaccia server, definisce i metodi eseguibili dai client
    Author:
    Demarinis - Micheli - Scarpellini
